## SuggestionActions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SuggestionActions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [stage](./extension-mention.suggestionactions.stage.md) | <code>SuggestionStage</code> | The current stage of the focused mention. Can be used to decide which action to use. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [command(attrs)](./extension-mention.suggestionactions.command.md) | A command automatically provides some default.<!-- -->This is the recommended option to use. |
|  [create(attrs)](./extension-mention.suggestionactions.create.md) | Create a mention for the first time |
|  [remove(attrs)](./extension-mention.suggestionactions.remove.md) | Remove the active suggestion |
|  [update(attrs)](./extension-mention.suggestionactions.update.md) | Update the active mention |
